description: The ZE-SDR-5 high speed SD/SDHC/MMC memory card reader comes complete with a USB cord for added convenience. It works perfectly with your desktop or laptop computer. It is compatible with PC's & MAC's. Ultra slim design and works with USB 2.0. It has a 1 year limited warranty. Includes USB cord.
title: Zeikos USB 2.0 SD/SDHC/MMC Flash Memory Card Reader ZE-SDR5
